column3: ananaben abɔfora w’egyapadze mu; Woegu w’asɔrfi krɔnkrɔn no ho fi; Wɔama Jerusalɛm ayɛ amamfo."

column2: "Wɔdze wo nkowaa efun ama ntumbowa edziban
column3: W’ahotseweefo honam ama asaase do mbowadoma."

column2: "Woehue hɔn bɔgyaa egu dɛ nsu dze etwa Jerusalɛm ho ehyia; Na obi nnyi hɔ a osie hɔn."

column3: Hɔn a woetwa hɛn ho ehyia si hɛn atwetwe

column5: aso wo bo bofuw daa? Aso wo nyinkun bɛdzɛw dɛ ogya?"

column2: "Hue w’ebufuw gu abosonsɔrfo a wonnyim wo no do
column3: Na nhenman a wɔmmbɔ wo dzin no do."

column5: "Mma nnkaa hɛn egyanom emumuyɛ nntsia hɛn; Ma w’ayamuhyehye ntwar hɛn ano ntsɛmara: Na wɔabrɛ hɛn adze koraa dodow."

column4: boa hɛn wɔ wo dzin n’enyimnyam ntsi: Gye hɛn

column2: "Ɔbɛyɛ dɛn ntsi na ebɛma amanaman ase dɛ
column3: Hɔn Nyankopɔn no wɔ hen? Ma wonhu no wɔ amanaman mu wɔ hɛn enyim dɛ Erotɔ wo nkowaa bɔgyaa a wɔka gu no do wer."

column2: "Ma ɔdaduafo nkrumsi ndu w’enyim; Dɛ mbrɛ w’abasa ne kɛseyɛ tse no kora hɔn a ɔtamfo no repɛ hɔn wu no do;"
"Na ahorbahyɛ a hɛn asɔnmufo hyɛ wo no
column4: bɔ ho mpɛn esuon gu hɔn tsir do."

column3: wo man na w’edzidzibea do nguan no Yɛdze ndaase bɛma wo daa; Yɛbɛka w’ayɛyi akyerɛ mbasantsen nyinara."
